column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Went here with a few girl friends right before Christmas time for brunch. The tapas here are really yummy and the sangria options are spectacular as well.  It's good to get a mix of savory and sweet tapas for the brunch and while the portions are not too big
column2: it's exciting to be able to try the different options.  Their paella was good but I preferred the smaller tapas plates.
